entry.title: WIND WARNING ENDED, Grande Cache

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 in wind prone areas early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 90 in wind prone areas late in the morning and in the afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Periods of snow near the British Columbia border overnight. Amount 5 cm near the British Columbia border. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 90 in wind prone areas. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
